00045 void EdgeQM::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00046                               std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00047                               bool free_vertices_only, 
00048                               MsqError& err )
00049 {
00050   get_edge_evaluations( pd, handles, free_vertices_only, false, err );

00053 void EdgeQM::get_single_pass( PatchData& pd, 
00054                               std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00055                               bool free_vertices_only, 
00056                               MsqError& err )
00057 {
00058   get_edge_evaluations( pd, handles, free_vertices_only, true, err );

00061 
00062 struct EdgeData {
00063   size_t endVtx;
00064   size_t adjElem;
00065   unsigned elemEdge;
00066 };
00067 
00068 inline bool operator<( const EdgeData& e1, const EdgeData& e2 )
00069   { return e1.endVtx < e2.endVtx; }
00070 inline bool operator==( const EdgeData& e1, const EdgeData& e2 )
00071   { return e1.endVtx == e2.endVtx; }
00072 
00073 
00074 void EdgeQM::get_edge_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00075                                    std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00076                                    bool free_vertices_only, 
00077                                    bool single_pass_evaluate,
00078                                    MsqError& err )
00079 {
00080   std::vector<EdgeData> vtx_edges;
00081   size_t n_verts = free_vertices_only ? pd.num_free_vertices() : pd.num_nodes();
00082   size_t n_cutoff = single_pass_evaluate ? pd.num_nodes() : n_verts;
00083   handles.clear();
00084 
00085   for (size_t i = 0; i < n_verts; ++i) {
00086     if (pd.vertex_by_index(i).is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED ))
00087       continue;
00088 
00089     vtx_edges.clear();
00090 
00091     size_t n_elems;
00092     const size_t* elems;
00093     elems = pd.get_vertex_element_adjacencies( i, n_elems, err );
00094     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00095 
00096     for (size_t j = 0; j < n_elems; ++j) {
00097       MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index(elems[j]);
00098       unsigned n_edges = TopologyInfo::edges( elem.get_element_type() );
00099       for (unsigned k = 0; k < n_edges; ++k) {
00100         const unsigned* edge = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem.get_element_type(), k, err );
00101         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00102 
00103         size_t vtx1 = elem.get_vertex_index_array()[edge[0]];
00104         size_t vtx2 = elem.get_vertex_index_array()[edge[1]];
00105         size_t other;
00106         if (vtx1 == i)
00107           other = vtx2;
00108         else if (vtx2 == i)
00109           other = vtx1;
00110         else
00111           continue;
00112         
00113           // If !free_vertices_only, we'll visit every edge twice.  
00114           // The first check below ensures that we only add each edge
00115           // once.  The second check is never true unless free_vertices_only
00116           // is true and single_pass_evaluate is false.  In that case, it 
00117           // serves as an exception to the first rule for those cases in which 
00118           // we visit an edge only once.  For single_pass_evaluate (e.g.
00119           // BCD initialization or QualityAssessor) we want to avoid visiting
00120           // and edge more than once for every patch rather than just within
00121           // this patch.
00122         if (other > i || other > n_cutoff) {
00123           EdgeData d = { other, elems[j], k };
00124           vtx_edges.push_back(d);
00125         }
00126       } // end for each edge in element
00127     } // end for each element adjacent to vertex
00128     
00129     std::sort( vtx_edges.begin(), vtx_edges.end() );
00130     std::vector<EdgeData>::iterator it, end;
00131     end = std::unique( vtx_edges.begin(), vtx_edges.end() );
00132     for (it = vtx_edges.begin(); it != end; ++it) 
00133       handles.push_back( handle( it->elemEdge, it->adjElem ) );
00134   } // end for each (free) vertex
00135 }
00136 
00137 bool EdgeQM::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00138                                     size_t handle,
00139                                     double& value,
00140                                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00141                                     MsqError& err )
00142 {
00143   const MsqMeshEntity& element = pd.element_by_index( elem(handle) );
00144   EntityTopology type = element.get_element_type(); 
00145   const unsigned* verts = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( type, edge(handle) );
00146   const size_t* conn = element.get_vertex_index_array();
00147   indices.clear();
00148   if (conn[verts[0]] < pd.num_free_vertices())
00149     indices.push_back( conn[verts[0]] );
00150   if (conn[verts[1]] < pd.num_free_vertices())
00151     indices.push_back( conn[verts[1]] );
00152   return evaluate( pd, handle, value, err );
00153 }
